item.description:
Hey Ya'll....

Four groups including two blazin' Texas-style rock bands with Willie J Laws Band (9:10 PM) & Throwdown  Band (11:30 PM) ...all for a $10 cover charge. Bands start at 8 PM through to 1 AM.

http://www.reverbnation.com/throwdown

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TgU1ecgmiKk&feature=related

Inspirations seem to be Albert Collins & Jimmy Ray Vaughn for the Throwdown & Albert King & Bo Diddley for the Willie J Laws.

The other two groups are A Ton of Blues (10:20 PM) and the Fran Dagostino Band (8:00 PM).

THIS MEETUP IS CO-POSTED TO 4 GROUPS! SOCIAL FUN , BOSTON HAPPY HOUR, FACEBOOK... so as we get lots a people comin'!

What we like about Hard Rock Cafe is, not everyone likes every group, so you can enter into the other room if you prefer to talk... and between sets we can also MEETUP!

You can buy tickets online at

Buy tickets online HERE http://flemingentertainment.ticketleap.com/blues-bash--hard-rock-cafe-cavern-club/ (Select one of four times depending on the time you plan to arrive.

Just choose one-- your favorite. (I'm choosin' Throwdown).

HUH!? Website says "YOU MUST WEAR BLUE TO GET IN"..!

http://www.hardrock.com/locations/cafes3/events.aspx?LocationID=101&MIBenumID=3

Otherwise come early if you need a ticket. This will sell out. Doors open at 7:30.

Best bet take the T. Closet T stop  Haymarket on the Orange or Green  lines.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a crocodile Dundee hat.
item.name: Texas Style Rock @ Hard Rock Cafe
